description: Try our easy to follow Cauliflower, Anchovy & Pecorino Pasta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pasta,Roast,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Cauliflower,Peanut free
name: Cauliflower, Anchovy & Pecorino Pasta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small cauliflower, cut into small florets
4 sprig flat-leaf parsley, leaves picked, chopped
2 slice free from gluten bread, torn into small pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line two baking trays with baking paper. Place cauliflower on one tray. Drizzle with 1 tbs of the oil, season and toss to coat. Roast for 30-35 minutes or until tender and golden.
Place bread pieces onto second tray. Drizzle with 1 tbs of oil and scatter over fennel seeds and chilli flakes. Toss to coat and bake for 15-20 minutes or until golden and crisp.
Cook pasta according to packet instructions. Drain, reserving 1/3 cup of cooking liquid. Return pasta to pan and drizzle with a little extra oil. Set aside.
Heat remaining oil in a medium frying pan. Cook onion and garlic for 8 minutes or until very soft. Add anchovy and pumpkin seeds and cook for a further 3 minutes or until seeds are lightly toasted.
Add cauliflower, pasta, reserved cooking liquid, parsley and lemon juice. Toss to combine and simmer for 1 minute.
Divide between serving bowls. Top with breadcrumbs, pecorino and a drizzle of extra oil. Serve with salad leaves.
